body.name: GL.iNet GL-MT300N-V2(Mango) Portable Mini Travel Wireless Pocket VPN WiFi Router - Access Point/Extender/WDS | OpenWrt | 2 x Ethernet Ports | OpenVPN/Wireguard VPN | USB 2.0 | 128MB RAM
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 12 hrs 51 mins
FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 12 hrs 51 mins
features: 【WIRELESS MOBILE MINI TRAVEL ROUTER】 Convert a public network (wired or wireless) to a private Wi-Fi for secure surfing. Tethering. Powered by any laptop USB, power banks or 5V/2A DC adapters (sold separately). 39g (1.41 Oz) only, portable and pocket friendly. 2.4GHz ONLY
【OPEN SOURCE & PROGRAMMABLE】 OpenWrt pre-installed, USB disk extendable.
【LARGER STORAGE & EXTENDABILITY】 128MB RAM, 16MB Flash ROM, dual Ethernet ports, UART and GPIOs available for hardware DIY.
【OPENVPN CLIENT】 OpenVPN client pre-installed, compatible with 30+ VPN service providers.
【PACKAGE CONTENTS】 GL-MT300N-V2 (Mango) mini router (1-year Warranty), USB cable, Ethernet cable, User Manual. Please update to the latest firmware.
body.description: Security It's outstanding security protocols and data encryption technology offers an extra layer of protection wherever you go. Privacy It is the best travel accessory for business travelers, journalists, frequent flyers and anyone who feels the need to protect their privacy while surfing the internet. OpenVPN and Wireguard It supports 30+ popular OpenVPN service providers and Wireguard.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars simply A.M.A.Z.I.N.G.... ready for details!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Whoever made this is genius! I didn't know I needed this until I got one.I have 3 children and our family likes to take road trips and vacations frequently.As soon as we get to a hotel, the first thing that my kids and my wife want to do is connect their smart phones and devices to the hotel Wifi so they all ask about the password, room number, etcWell, no more of that! I just log into the Admin Panel of this neat device from my phone then connect to the hotel Wifi, and BAM! all my family's smart phones and devices are automatically connected to the Wifi!WHAT I LIKE:[+] very compact yet powerful and pacts so many features![+] micro USB port for powering this amazing device and it can be powered on from portable battery, making it truly portable even on the go![+] option to connect to internet connection using Ethernet cable for those rare places that don't have Wifi yet or has very weak signal[+] USB port for providing Wifi via tethering (it's better than smart phone's hot spot)[+] option to provide internet connection via Ethernet cable for older devices that don't have Wifi capability[+] added security and privacy when connected to Wifi using this MANGO[+] open VPN client option (although I never used it and don't know how to use it yet)[+] also comes with Ethernet cable, micro USB cable, and easy to understand, extensible user manual[+] The admin control panel software is very intuitive and powerful with so many advanced features found in high end Wifi routers[+] price!!! can't beat this price[+] LOVE the color and name MANGO!WHAT I DON'T LIKE:[-] I wish it had more information and instruction on how to use the open VPN client feature[-] It has one switch without a label and I didn't know what it was but I found out that it's for turning on/off the VPN if you are using that featureTHE BOTTOM LINE:10 out of 5 stars! I highly recommend this cute yet amazing device. It now has a permanent space in my travel kit case along with wall chargers and extra charging cables so I would never forget this device on the go.This is one impressive device that I never thought I needed it until I found out what it can do.Hope my video, photos, and info were useful... and if they were, please click on the helpful button below. Thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes Nintendo Switch work in Hotels
reviews.reviewText: My requirement for this device was fairly specific. I travel every week for work and have begun bringing my Nintendo Switch on these trips with me. The problem is that the Nintendo Switch is notoriously horrible at connecting to wifi with a captive portal (aka registration splash screen). Such as hotels or other public wifi might require for confirmation to connect via a browser window. Basically the Switch hidden browser is worthless for these situations and hardly ever works.So I bought this device as a work around. By using this router to connect to the hotel wifi I only need it to make the connection and then it rebroadcasts my own private network. Which the Nintendo Switch can connect to just like any normal wifi that doesn't use captive portals within internet browsers (such as your home network).Setup was fairly straightforward. Granted I am a Network Engineer so I have a slight advantage. However, I found the instructions easy enough for anyone. My only minor complaint is that the router doesn't start broadcasting unless you toggle the "mode" switch located on the side (next to the reset button). The instructions aren't clear on that and the toggle switch itself isn't even labelled (but it is called out in the manual). Anyway turn that on first.Once I had setup the router per the instructions. I went ahead and pre-connected all of my devices (phone, laptop, Nintendo) while it was connected to my home network.Then a few days later I setup the router in a hotel. Using my phone I went to the router IP address (admin menus) and connected it to the hotel wifi. Then I launched a browser via my phone to do the hotel wifi registration. Done.Now the router is on the hotel wifi and all of my devices are connected to the router. One IP address. One registration (instead of having to register multiple times for multiple devices). Turned on my Nintendo Switch and it worked perfectly. No messing around with the Nintendo browser.So in summary. The router works on hotel wifi with captive portal. You only need to perform the hotel registration once and all of your devices are good.For $20 something bucks this just saved me a month of hotel registration headaches that I have been fighting. Thumbs up and highly recommend for anyone else in a similar situation.Side bonus this will give your personal devices an extra layer of protection from those public networks. This router is also very small (about 2x2 inches) so it easily fits inside a Nintendo Switch travel case if you own one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to setup and works well. Definitely worth the price
reviews.reviewText: We received our unit on time and surprisingly provides a lot of utility for its small size. I used last week in an Orlando Resort/hotel. I was able to attach it as an extender to hotel wifi. It connected after a couple of tries then I was able use my laptop to authenticate to get full access. My vpn worked with no issue’s. It provided excellent coverage throughout the two bedroom condo. On the downside I was not able to get it connect to the Sanford Fl airport wifi. I keep receiving a connection error. I had to connect with my cell and tether it to the unit. Also the unit does not come with a wall charger. You need to have a usb charger for it to work. Definitely recommend. Will be using it on my next trip

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Little Engine That Could
reviews.reviewText: I recently bought and used this portable mini travel wireless pocket router, and it's been a fantastic addition for my travel. This compact device is a real lifesaver, especially in hotels with unreliable Wi-Fi connections. It's incredibly easy to set up, and the performance is impressive. I was able to connect multiple devices to it, and the signal strength was consistently strong.What I love most is its portability. It's truly pocket-sized and doesn't take up much space in my bag. This mini router has become a go-to for me during my travels, making sure I'm always connected and secure. I highly recommend it to fellow travelers looking for a reliable and compact Wi-Fi solution on the go.

reviews.reviewTitle: A Compact Powerhouse for On-the-Go Connectivity - GL.iNET GL-MT300N-V2
reviews.reviewText: 've recently had the pleasure of using the GL.iNET GL-MT300N-V2 Wireless Mini Portable Travel Router, and it's been an absolute game-changer for my on-the-go connectivity needs. Here's why it deserves a standing ovation:Compact and Portable: This router is incredibly small and lightweight, making it a breeze to carry around. It's a true travel companion that fits in your pocket without adding any bulk to your luggage.Easy Setup: Setting up the router is a breeze. Within minutes, you can have it up and running, creating your secure Wi-Fi network wherever you are.Versatile Functionality: Despite its size, this little device is packed with features. It serves as a Wi-Fi repeater, bridge, access point, and even a VPN client. It's a Swiss Army knife for connectivity.Stellar Performance: The GL-MT300N-V2 delivers reliable and fast Wi-Fi wherever you go. Whether in a hotel, coffee shop, or remote location, it ensures a strong and secure connection.Security First: Security is a top priority, and this router offers multiple encryption methods to keep your data safe while traveling. It's a reassuring layer of protection for your online activities.Open Source Friendly: For tech enthusiasts, the router supports OpenWrt, providing endless possibilities for customization and advanced configurations.Excellent Customer Support: GL.iNET provides excellent customer support, ensuring you have assistance whenever you need it.In conclusion, the GL.iNET GL-MT300N-V2 Wireless Mini Portable Travel Router is a must-have for travelers, digital nomads, and anyone in need of reliable, secure, and versatile connectivity on the go. Its compact size, impressive functionality, and ease of use make it an essential tool for staying connected while traveling. I can't imagine my trips without it anymore!

Le routeur sans fil GL-MT300N-V2 de GL-iNet est une petite merveille qui a révolutionné mes voyages. Sa portabilité et sa facilité d'utilisation en font le choix parfait pour rester connecté en déplacement. La fonction VPN intégrée assure une connexion sécurisée, idéale pour protéger ma vie numérique. Malgré sa taille compacte, ce routeur offre des performances fiables et une couverture Wi-Fi étonnante. En résumé, GL-MT300N-V2 est bien plus qu'un simple routeur de voyage, c'est un outil essentiel pour une connectivité sûre et pratique lors de mes déplacements.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on November 27, 2023

reviews.reviewText: Este mini router es una maravilla, yo lo uso para conectarme a llá donde viajo con total seguridad creando mi propia red y no sienod visibel para la red donde me conecto. Para la VPN uso OpneVPN desde un servidor que tengo en la nube y va genial además que se puede activar físicamente con un interruptor, no hay que meterse dentro dle router.La configuración desde el movil es super sencilla, el tamaño de bolsillo es una pasada y si estas cerca, que es donde lo suelo usar yo a 2m, pillas casi todo el ancho de banda wifi que dá, pero como curiosidad en la casa de mis padres en la segunda planta el router de telefónica no da buena señal estando en la primera y sin anbargo puedo conectarme a este minirouter desde la planta baja la segunda, tiene muy buena señal para ser tan pequeño y no llevar antenas externas.No puedo estar más contento.
